feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions with OKLCH variables and light/dark mode styling for global UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up PWA metadata, icons, theme color, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining metadata, icons, display mode, and categories for Global Tales.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching, offline support, and network-first strategies for app shell and assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routes, splash/onboarding flow, PWA registration, drawer state, and layout logic for full-screen pages.

frontend/src/components/AppDrawer.tsx: Side drawer menu with navigation links and premium status or upsell section.

frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with translated labels and active tab highlighting.
frontend/src/components/CategoryScroller: Scrollable horizontal list of categories filtered by mode with navigation on click.
frontend/src/components/ContinueReadingC: Card showing the last read story with title, author, cover, and progress bar.
frontend/src/components/DailyStoryNotifi: Dismissible banner announcing the daily story, hidden for 24 hours after dismissal.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: PWA install prompt banner with install button and dismiss option.
frontend/src/components/InterstitialAdMo: Modal showing an interstitial ad placeholder with a countdown before continuing, hidden for premium users.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown selector for choosing the app language from supported options.
frontend/src/components/LegalSupportPage: Layout wrapper for legal/support pages with back button and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ModeToggle.tsx: Toggle allowing users to switch between adults and kids modes.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Runs a multi-step onboarding flow for language, mode, and theme selection with transitions.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/StepT: Provides directional slide/fade animations for transitioning between onboarding steps.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Premium indicator with multiple visual variants including icon-only and compact.

frontend/src/components/ReminderBanner.t: Shows a dismissible banner reminding users of new stories based on reminder logic.
frontend/src/components/ShareSheetPlaceh: Handles story sharing via Web Share API or link copying, with toasts and engagement tracking.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Displays an animated splash screen with app icon, branding, taglines, and loader.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Renders a clickable story card (featured or standard) with image, metadata, and premium lock state.

frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUser.ts: Manages authenticated and guest user state, syncing with backend and localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Handles favorite story toggling for authenticated and guest users using backend or localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDownloads.t: Implements offline story storage using localStorage with bigint serialization.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers-reduced-motion OS setting and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Manages PWA install prompt handling, dismissal persistence, and triggering the prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useReadingHistory.ts: Manages reading history for authenticated and guest users with localStorage fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch stories, individual story data, and the daily featured story.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Handles authenticated and guest user profile retrieval and saving using React Query and localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, multi-language fonts, and UI animation keyframes.
frontend/src/lib/covers.ts: Returns cover image URLs based on category and kid-friendly mode.
frontend/src/lib/engagement.ts: Stores and updates engagement metrics like streaks, shares, badges, and bonus story unlocks in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/fonts.ts: Maps UI languages to corresponding font class names.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Provides supported languages list and localized UI string dictionaries.
frontend/src/lib/kidsMode.ts: Defines kid-safe categories and filters category lists based on kids mode.
frontend/src/lib/notifications.ts: Utility helpers for browser notification capability, permission handling, and test notifications.
frontend/src/lib/onboarding.ts: Tracks onboarding completion status using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/profileValidation.ts: Validates usernames and profile images or URLs for profile updates.
frontend/src/lib/reminders.ts: Manages reminder settings and last-shown timestamps in localStorage with helpers to decide when to show reminders.
frontend/src/lib/share.ts: Provides sharing utilities for app and stories with Web Share API support and clipboard fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/storyLanguage.ts: Maps UI languages to backend languages and retrieves story content or translation availability.
frontend/src/lib/translatePlaceholder.ts: Generates placeholder translated story content using English as fallback.
frontend/src/lib/uiPolish.ts: Defines shared UI styling constants like sizes, spacing, and button configurations.
frontend/src/lib/userProfileStorage.ts: Handles guest profile persistence in localStorage with get, save, and clear functions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: Renders the About Us page with navigation and descriptive text about the platform.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesTab.tsx: Displays a grid of story categories with covers and navigation to category details.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryDetail.tsx: Shows stories within a category with language filtering, loading states, and mode toggle.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesTab.tsx: Lists the user's favorited stories or shows an empty-state message.
frontend/src/pages/GoPremium.tsx: Displays premium subscription options, benefits, and handles mock subscription state.
frontend/src/pages/HelpAndSupport.tsx: Provides help tips, contact info, social links, and a support-themed layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomeTab.tsx: Main home screen fetching featured and latest stories, showing ads, categories, and notification banner.
frontend/src/pages/PremiumSuccess.tsx: Displays confirmation of premium upgrade with benefits list and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data practices, ads, children policy, contact, and updates.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileTab.tsx: User profile page with editing, notifications, sharing, validation, and engagement features.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Search interface filtering stories by text and sort order with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/StoryReader.tsx: Story reading view with fetching, favorites, downloads, auto-scroll, and reading preferences.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditions.ts: Static terms page detailing usage rules, premium notes, and contact info.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers service worker on load and checks for updates periodically.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, layout, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, pending requests, and the overall iterative polish goals for the app.
